column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was an overall unfortunate experience (but the rest of Chicago has been quite enjoyable to check out)! First
column2: I was told there would be a 35 minute wait. Over an hour later
column3: and after witnessing multiple parties of two who had been seated before me but had arrived after me
column4: I approached the hostess and was told that I was next for a 2-top (I was dining alone). Why were the parties of 2 who arrived after me seated before me?!? At that point
column5: I still thought it would be worth it. Then I received my pizza and wished I'd ordered room service at my hotel instead. It was warm
column6: but not enough for the cheese to stretch at all. Table service left much to be desired. What a disappointment!
